a.n: Les Petits Meurtres, Secrets De Tournage

p.d: Are you a fan of the series "Les Petits Meurtres d'Agatha Christie"? Would you love to discover all its secrets? Blandine Bellavoir, Alice Avril in the series, will take you where no one from the outside is allowed: on the set during the filming of an episode. Follow the guide! Director: Bertrand Mouly, Arnaud Perron (France, 2017)
